stimulusHtml: Which of the following preconditions for the method is most appropriate to ensure that the value printed by the code segment is always positive?

features.html:
The following code segment appears in a method. In the code segment,  x  and  y  are  double  variables.

 

double result = (x - y) / 2.0;
System.out.println(result);

choicesHtml: /** Precondition: x and y are both positive. */
/** Precondition: x and y are both even. */
